channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: First Formosan Mountain Dog To Join Police Force
item.description: A Formosan mountain dog is in training to become the first of its breed to join Taiwan's police force.

item.title: Family of Taiwan Military Officer Held in China Calls for His Release
item.description: The family of a Taiwanese military officer has applied for his voluntary discharge and called for his release from China. The soldier has been held in China since March when he was

item.title: Palestine Supporters Warn Taiwan Could Be Complicit in Israel-Hamas War
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protesters in Taiwan are calling for an end to Israel-Hamas war in the Gaza Strip and for what they say is Taiwanâ€™s complicity in it.

item.title: Defense Ministry Spots 45 Chinese Aircraft, 6 Vessels in Taiwan Strait
item.description: Taiwan's defense ministry has reported 45 Chinese aircraft and six vessels operating around Taiwan, just a week before Taiwan inaugurates its new president on May 20th. Correctio
